about_the_game:
While you are trying to save the defenseless furry citizens, clothes end up getting ripped out. Of course, none of that matters, we are trying to save lives here!

The third world now comes full with "small surprises" in it. Enjoy!

content_descriptors.notes: This DLC contains full body cartoon nudity of anthropomorphic animals (furry) with male and female genitalia exposure and is not suitable for bellow 18 year old players.

detailed_description:
While you are trying to save the defenseless furry citizens, clothes end up getting ripped out. Of course, none of that matters, we are trying to save lives here!

The third world now comes full with "small surprises" in it. Enjoy!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6 or Later
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct x Compatible
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6 or Later
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct x Compatible

name: OctoFurry - Lewder

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Widows Xp
  • Processor: 1.5 Ghz (Intel Celeron / AMD Athlon 64 x2)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics or AMD Radeon
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct x Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.4 Ghz (Intel Core i5 / AMD Phenom II)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8000+ / Radeon HD 5000+
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct x Compatible

short_description: Enjoy seeing all of the characters's secrets! Adult content.
